subject: Case 22840619 FW: [EXTERNAL] Invoice disputed by Account Number 203459639
raw_subject: Case 22840619 FW: [EXTERNAL] Invoice disputed by Account Number 203459639
description:
Hello,My name is Roseann, and I have been assigned to this case.FedExs Reweigh Verification Process was performed at a FedEx Freight Service Center and determined the weight from shipment didnt match the bill of lading.  When the weight doesnt match, the weight for the shipment is automatically updated.  My goal is to confirm the correct weight for this shipment but I will need two additional pieces of documentation from you for the commodities shipped to do that.  Please provide the following documentation within five (5) days: packing list or sales invoice with reference numbers will work but will need to include the ship date, shipper, consignee, weight, and the quantity of item(s) shipped   catalog page/webpage linkOnce I receive the two additional pieces of documentation with the information noted above, I can continue my review, reconcile the weight for the shipment, and make any applicable updates.Thank you,RoseannEBS Operations - Invoicing Solutions--------------- Original Message ---------------From: FedEx Freight [fedex@billtrust.com]Sent: 12/29/2024 11:46 PMTo: fxfrevsoltn@fedex.comSubject: [EXTERNAL] Invoice disputed by Account Number 203459639
Caution! This email originated outside of FedEx. Please do not open attachments or click links from an unknown or suspicious origin.

A full Invoice was disputed by Account Number 203459639.

Invoice Number: 282837645901Account Number: 203459639Customer Contact: Erika HernandezContact Phone Number: 844-416-2090Contact Fax Number: Customer did not provideContact Email: customerservice@eurekaergonomic.com
